name: Accelerator Pistol, Magnum (MAcP-10)
description:
The magnum version of the accelerator pistol. The weapon fires a projectile at a low initial velocity; after it leaves the barrel, an internal charge accelerates the bullet to greater velocities. Accelerator weapons have low recoil and are well adapted to zero-G environments.

This version of the weapon uses more powerful ammunition, causes more damage, and has a longer range than the standard version.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 1 : Characters and Combat
Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
